If you accumulate {otherParams[0]} or more Destiny by this way, you gain 1 Cul. and change this Immortal Fate to "Peach Branch Ruyi" (At the beginning of the battle, gain 1 stack of [Guard Up]).

When you breakthrough to the Incarnation Phase, this changes to selecting one (a random one is Level 2)

desc_cn_template:
战斗开始时若卡组中含以下八卦牌合计正好为2张，使用时增加对应效果：
震卦：施加4层破绽
坤卦：施加2层虚弱
巽卦：灵气+4
艮卦：生命及上限+10
坎卦：多加4格成为星位
兑卦：施加3层内伤
离卦：卦象+1
乾卦：再次行动
desc_en_template:
At the start of battle, if your deck contains exactly the following 2 Hexagram cards, those cards increase the corresponding effect:
Zhen Hexagram: Apply 4 stacks of [Flaw]
Earth Hexagram: Apply 2 stacks of [Weakened]
Wind Hexagram: Qi+4
Mountain Hexagram: HP and Max HP + 10
Water Hexagram: Make 4 more slots in your deck [Become Star Point]
Lake Hexagram: Apply 3 stacks of [Internal Injury]
Flame Hexagram: [Hexagram]+1
Heaven Hexagram: [Chase]

[棍]：自身所有攻加1；自身获得[减攻]时少加1层[减攻]
versions.desc_en:
[Fist]: Reduce incoming ATK by 1; when gaining [Wound], reduce the stack count by 1.
[Staff]: Increase all ATK by 1; when gaining [Decrease ATK], reduce the stack count by 1.
